nodes.text: Squad 5-Aurek was an Imperial Army squad attached to Battlegroup Turak. During the Battle of Turak IV, this squad was among the Imperial units dispatched to retrieve a repulsortank from the Imperial Hammers Elite Armor Unit. The squad consisted of ten Imperial Army troopers, including one commander, one grenadier, and one repeating blaster rifle specialist. Apart from the grenadier and the repeating blaster rifle specialist, the members of this squad were armed with blaster rifles and vibroblades.
